New Records: Virat Kohli scored 64 not out off 44 balls
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and K. L. Rahul scored half centuries to set a target of 185
Rain interrupted the innings to help India pull off a narrow win
Post-Match Reflections: A piece of sheer on-field brilliance by a rejuvenated KL Rahul and divine intervention by the weather gods took India one step closer to the T20 World Cup semifinals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a rain-curtailed contest
India beat Bangladesh by 5 runs in the T20 World Cup Super 12 match
